item.title: Install OpenCV on Windows with Choco
item.description: Install OpenCV on Windows with Choco 在 Windows 系统上安装 OpenCV This article records how to install opencv on windows with choco and use opencv in Visual Studio. Install OpenCV choco install opencv My version is OpenCV 4.5.5, my installation path is C:/tools Add PATH: Use in Visual Studio Reference: How to build applications with OpenCV inside the “Microsoft Visual Studio” Add PATH If opencv_world455d.lib not found, probably you miss this step.
